summary: In this context, Buta-1,3-diene and Butadiene are essentially the same compound, with Buta-1,3-diene being an alternative name for 1,3-butadiene. The text discusses the measurement of 1,3-butadiene in cigarette smoke using GC/MS and TDL spectroscopy methods, indicating their relevance in the analysis of smoke constituents. The relationship is direct, as they refer to the same chemical entity involved in the study of smoke emissions.
